name: Doki Doki Storm
summary: Doki Doki Storm is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club intended to be a character study of Yuri, told entirely from her point of view, showcasing her struggles with fitting in, her feelings of self-loathing, her escapism into fantasy, her attempts to overcome her self-harm habit, and her eventual descent into madness. Don't let that screenshot above fool you; this is a very dark mod, rather different from my previous work, in that it deals with deep emotional pain and gets quite bloody. Even if you enjoyed my previous work, please use your discretion when playing. Be safe and pace yourself if you need to.
